nodes.bodyText:
ah, yes, not surprised we need to exclude modules/, I think I remember needing that in a different project.
this one so far I haven't seen anything show up in there except for .iml files, which are already ignored. other things end up in there too?

nodes.bodyText: PlainTextFileType? Does this disable inspections and rendering for the README?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -12,5 +12,8 @@
     </writeAnnotations>
   </component>
   <component name="ExternalStorageConfigurationManager" enabled="true" />
-  <component name="ProjectRootManager" version="2" languageLevel="JDK_1_8" default="false" project-jdk-name="liberica-11" project-jdk-type="JavaSDK" />
+  <component name="ProjectPlainTextFileTypeManager">
+    <file url="file://$PROJECT_DIR$/README.markdown" />
